title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 October 2008 - XWiki
content: Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:23): hi sdumitriu - (24/10/2008 00:24): Hi Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:24): is this the right room for XWiki ? sdumitriu - (24/10/2008 00:25): Yes Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:25): ok Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:25): i search for XWiki code... sdumitriu - (24/10/2008 00:26): You mean source code? sdumitriu - (24/10/2008 00:26): This is the place to start looking: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:26): yes Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:26): thanks sdumitriu - (24/10/2008 00:27): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository Neos\_Xristis - (24/10/2008 00:28): thanks sdumitriu sdumitriu - (24/10/2008 00:28): You're welcome xwikibot - (24/10/2008 00:29): Community.SourceRepository was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/SourceRepository xwikibot - (24/10/2008 03:25): Snippets.SettingRightsSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.SharanMudgal (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/SettingRightsSnippet xwikibot - (24/10/2008 03:26): Snippets.SettingRightsSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.SharanMudgal (Deleted object) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/SettingRightsSnippet xwikibot - (24/10/2008 03:28): Snippets.SettingRightsSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.SharanMudgal (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/SettingRightsSnippet xwikibot - (24/10/2008 03:29): Snippets.SettingRightsSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.SharanMudgal (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/SettingRightsSnippet xwikibot - (24/10/2008 03:29): Snippets.SettingRightsSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.SharanMudgal (Deleted object) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/SettingRightsSnippet xwikibot - (24/10/2008 10:41): XWiki.schmoell was modified by XWiki.schmoell (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/schmoell phreeza - (24/10/2008 11:10): i don't understand something about the mappings. the hibernate mapping maps all the PropertyClasses to their own tables. but it seems like these tables are all empty? Do they never get saved? phreeza - (24/10/2008 11:11): or are they legacy? xwikibot - (24/10/2008 11:15): XWiki.hel was modified by XWiki.hel (Upload new image helmutlehner.jpg.png) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/hel xwikibot - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/ChildPageSnippet vmassol - (24/10/2008 11:22): phreeza: I don't know phreeza - (24/10/2008 11:23): vmassol: it's weird... somehow the classes must be made persistent but they don't show up in my database... phreeza - (24/10/2008 11:23): objects and properties show up. phreeza - (24/10/2008 11:28): spooky :) xwikibot - (24/10/2008 11:53): XWiki.pppp was modified by XWiki.pppp (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/pppp xwikibot -
